description.value: Immune to Pinning from Pistols and Basic Weapons, Add +1 AP to cover protecting you from ranged attacks.

system.benefit: Immune to Pinning from Pistols and Basic Weapons, Add +1 AP to cover protecting you from ranged attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Pinning Immunity
specialAbilities.description: You are immune to Pinning from Pistol and Basic weapons.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Cover
specialAbilities.description: Add +1 AP to any cover protecting you from ranged attacks.
